import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Content = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); // Retrieve data from localStorage when the component mounts useEffect(() => { const storedCartItems = localStorage.getItem("cartItems"); ; // Parse the JSON data into a JavaScript object const parsedCartItems = storedCartItems ? JSON.parse(storedCartItems) : []; // Set the state with the parsed data setProducts(parsedCartItems); }, []); // The empty dependency array ensures this effect runs only once on mount return (
{products.length > 0 && products.map((row) => (
Product Quantity Price
{row.quantity}
${row.price * row.quantity} ${row.price} each
handleRemoveCartItem(row.id)}> Remove
))}
Mua hàng Continue shopping

Free Delivery within 1-2 weeks

Total price:
${totalPrice}
Discount:
USD 658
Total:
$1,650

) }; export default Content
